mapper.select: SELECT to_char(orderdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as orderday, sum(ototalprice) as sales, count(*) as orderamount FROM amb.orderdata WHERE orderdate >= #{searchStartDate} and orderdate < to_char(#{searchEndDate}) GROUP BY to_char(orderdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') ORDER BY 1

SELECT iostatus, to_char(iodate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as iodate, count(ioamount) as ioamount FROM amb.product_io WHERE iodate >= #{searchStartDate} and iodate < to_char(#{searchEndDate}) and iostatus=#{InOutType} GROUP BY to_char(iodate, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), iostatus order by iodate desc

SELECT to_char(orderdate, 'yyyy-mm') as ordermonth, sum(ototalprice) as sales, count(*) as orderamount from amb.orderdata where orderdate >= to_char(#{searchStartDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and orderdate < to_char(#{searchEndDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') group by to_char(orderdate, 'yyyy-mm') order by 1

SELECT to_char(orderdate, 'yyyy') as orderyear , sum(ototalprice) as sales, count(*) as orderamount from amb.orderdata where orderdate >= #{searchStartDate} and orderdate < to_char(#{searchEndDate}) group by to_char(orderdate, 'yyyy') order by 1
select count(*) as todayOrderCount from orderdata where to_char(orderdate, 'yyyy/mm/dd')=to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy/mm/dd')

select (case when todayProductInCount is null then 0 else todayProductInCount end) as todayProductInCount from(select sum(ioamount) as todayProductInCount from product_io where to_char(iodate, 'yyyy/mm/dd')=to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy/mm/dd') and iostatus='입고')

select (case when todayProductOutCount is null then 0 else todayProductOutCount end) as todayProductOutCount from(select sum(ioamount) as todayProductOutCount from product_io where to_char(iodate, 'yyyy/mm/dd')=to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy/mm/dd') and iostatus='출고')

select (case when todaytotalprice is null then 0 else todaytotalprice end) as todaySalesTotalPrice from (select sum(ototalprice) as todaytotalprice from orderdata where to_char(orderdate, 'yyyy/mm/dd')=to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy/mm/dd'))
